column4: Hello everyone, i'm a newbie to ubuntu but i'm here to ask a question, is there a kind of wine project for mac programs ?
@pici, i think it is not that difficult. Mac is builed on a freebsd kernel.
I believe there is some way to do this if you are running Linux on mac hardware though.. not sure about this
I run mac on a intel pc (p4). So it must be possible, maybe a project that i can make XD
